doc.field: HONEYWELL HON> UNIT GETS COMPUTER CONTRACTS

Honeywell Bull Inc, the newly formed company jointly owned by Honeywell Inc, NEC Corp> of Japan and Compagnie des Machines Bull> of France, received four contracts for mainframe computers and related equipment. Honeywell Bull said it received separate contracts from Coleco Industries CLO>; North West Securities>, a British-based financial institution; the DeKalb Country School System of Georgia, and Banca Popolare De Vicenza, an Italian regional bank. Reuter
